node.title: Making a New Start
node.description: Have you ever wished your life had a “Restart” button? Many use the beginning of each new year to reflect on the past and make resolutions for the new. And while God doesn’t require us to wait until December 31, searching our hearts and starting anew are biblical concepts! Join Pastor Clark and the Dalton church family as they explore new beginnings, a message culminated with a special new start – a baptism!
